items.sentence: Tom knows how to get in touch with me if he needs me.
Tom kissed Mary under the mistletoe on Christmas Eve.
Tom is very good at teaching people how to do things.
Tom is the pastor at the small church on Park Street.
Tom is in the hospital recovering from heart surgery.
Tom is going to attend today's meeting instead of me.
Tom intends to visit his uncle in Boston next spring.
Tom hasn't decided who he's going to ask to the prom.
Tom has been hanging around with some strange people.
Tom has already decided not to go Boston next summer.
